parse.title: List of last survivors of historical events

text.*:
The following is a list of last survivors of notable historical and cultural events, excluding wars, which are covered in separate lists that can be found in the See also section.

  Deceased   Living

Contents

  • 1 Before 1701
  • 2 1701–1800
  • 3 1801–1850
  • 4 1851–1900
  • 5 1901–1915
  • 6 1916–1930
  • 7 1931–1945
  • 8 1946–1960
  • 9 1961–2000s
  • 10 See also
  • 11 References
